name: United States Of Greater Austria
startIntroPart1: By the Grace of God, all hail Kaiser Karl I, emperor of Austria! Great and holy Austria is the legal descendant of the Roman Empire through the Holy Roman Empire. As such, the great empire of Austria holds preeminence upon the rulers of Christendom. The United States of Greater Austria holds dominion over Austria, Hungary, Bohemia, the Triune Kingdom of Croatia, Bosnia, Transylvania, southern Poland and northern Italy. No war will topple the United States of Greater Austria, God willing!
startIntroPart2: Your Imperial and Royal Majesty, the peoples of the Empire are asking you to help lead the Empire to victory against all those who oppose it! Will you uphold Christendom? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: You dare threaten the empire? This means war!
attacked: We will only receive your utter submission!
defeated: The defeat of Austria is the death of Christendom. Dark times are upon us all.
introduction: As the emperor of Austria, you are worthy of our attention.
tradeRequest: You will have the privilege of trading with us.
uniques: Damage is ignored when determining unit Strength <for [non-air] units>
Can spend Gold to annex or puppet a City-State that has been your ally for [5] turns.
